data.description: Data storage for IP routers and others
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The toplevel-namespace "IPDevice" was chosen because I have not
    found any other namespace where I believe a storage module like this
    would fit in.

    Also, the modules will be extended by analyzers, parsers and more
    in the near future, providing a complete suite (>30 modules) for
    vendor-intependend handling of WAN network hardware and
    configuration. I believe that it makes sense to have this large
    collection of modules in one namespace.

    The suite of modules, representing an IP router, is commercially
    developed; I believe it might be interesting for other IP backbone
    providers too.
